message_1: Consider the Caesar cipher with key 3, and assume that the only characters being used are uppercase letters. Decrypt the message "XIVHMEXSRGI" using cryptanalysis.
message_2:
To decrypt the message "XIVHMEXSRGI" using cryptanalysis, we will subtract the key (3) from each letter's position in the alphabet. If the result is less than 1, we will add 26 to get the correct position.

X -> (24 - 3) % 26 = 21 -> U
I -> (9 - 3) % 26 = 6 -> F
V -> (22 - 3) % 26 = 19 -> S
H -> (8 - 3) % 26 = 5 -> E
M -> (13 - 3) % 26 = 10 -> J
E -> (5 - 3) % 26 = 2 -> B
X -> (24 - 3) % 26 = 21 -> U
S -> (19 - 3) % 26 = 16 -> P
R -> (18 - 3) % 26 = 15 -> O
G -> (7 - 3) % 26 = 4 -> D
I -> (9 - 3) % 26 = 6 -> F

The decrypted message is "UFS EJBUPODF".
